jobs:
POLICE - Police can arrest wanted criminals by either hitting them with a nightstick or jacking them out of a vehicle.
MECHANICS - Mechanic's can fix vehicles by entering them as a passenger (there must be a driver).
PARAMEDICS - Paramedics can heal people either by hitting them with flowers or allowing them to enter their ambulance.
CARJACKERS - Carjackers can jack players out of their vehicles and earn a bit of the victim's money.
TAXI DRIVERS - Taxi drivers can transport people around San Andreas for a bit of money.
